description: {"blocks":[{"key":"kqp4","text":"This protocol is meant to perform samples preparation of PCR plates for 1 or more primer sets (defined number of primers per set established by the user) to the same samples, i.e, we will have for all the selected samples (we can set the initial well and number of samples) of all source plates the master mix with different primer sets (combination of primers, water and polymerase mix) in the final plates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8dti2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"23can","text":"To run this protocol is needed a python script for an Opentrons 2 robot and an excel (.xlsx) file with several variables making the protocol modular to reactives, volumes of transfer, type of plates, number of primers per set, etc.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6i5i6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6g66v","text":"In guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"2bpit","text":"This protocol was developed with python 3.7.1, OT App Software Version 6.3.1 and API level version 2.14 in a Linux 4.14.74 system (these are the OT-2 specifications).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1vlo0","text":"In the script several packages are used:  pandas (0.25.3), openpyxl (3.1.2), math, random and numpy (1.15.1)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ktsa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bhtbk","text":"It has been tested with cultures from Pseudomonas putida KT2440 and PCR products as part of the High-throughput workflow for the genotypic characterization of transposon library variants. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":38,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ghcl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8md68","text":"The maximum number of primer sets that can be incubated with a full 96-well plate having a heater-shaker module set as True, the thermocycler set as False, the replace tip rack variable set as False is 3.
